sentences.cn: 大约花3.5万英镑就能买到一所宜居的房子。

sentences.en: Even the paradise of fools is not an unpleasant abode while it is habitable.
sentences.cn: 纵然是愚人的天堂,在还可居住之时,亦非不愉快之地.

sentences.en: Every inhabitant of this planet must contemplate that it may no longer be habitable.
sentences.cn: 世界上每个人都必须思考到地球上可能不再适合人住的那一天.

sentences.en: It is easily the most habitable season of the year.
sentences.cn: 因为秋天无疑是一年中最惬意的季节.

sentences.en: It would cost a fortune to make the place habitable.
sentences.cn: 要想让这个地方可以住人得花一大笔钱。

sentences.en: Making the house habitable was a major undertaking.
sentences.cn: 把这所房子收拾得可以住人，那可是项大工程。

sentences.en: Planets in the habitable zone have a range of temperatures that might support life.
sentences.cn: 在可居住带的星球都有一带温度适宜生物生长的区域.

sentences.en: Robbie: Well, actually I do. I don't believe that earth is the only habitable planet.
sentences.cn: 罗比: 唔, 事实上,我相信耶. 我不认为地球是唯一有生物栖息的星球.

sentences.en: Tensions escalate and wars erupt over the last remaining habitable land.
sentences.cn: 在最后的一块居住地上,紧张局面加剧,战争爆发了.

sentences.en: The house should be habitable by the new year.
sentences.cn: 房子到新年时应该就可以住进去了。

sentences.en: The lowest habitable story of a building, usually below ground level.
sentences.cn: 可居住的最低的建筑物楼层, 通常在地平面以下.

sentences.en: The northernmost region of the habitable world as thought of by ancient geographers.
sentences.cn: 古代地理学家们认为的世界上有人居住的最北地区.

sentences.en: Their damp drafty house was scarcely habitable.
sentences.cn: 他们潮湿透风的屋子不宜住人.

sentences.en: This area is no longer habitable.
This house is no longer habitable.
sentences.cn: 这所房子已经不能住人了.

sentences.en: This is a good thing because it keeps our planet habitable.
sentences.cn: 这是一件好事,因为它使得我们的星球适合居住.

trans.tran_en: good enough for people to live in
